now for the bottom there you can't really get the stamp in there in that

will fill that in with color without having to use the stamp
okay cool now let's hit our table this is set up I had from my cursor straw

just really adds to the dimension you know the play space these are great
because you can do smaller setups like this the dungeon blocks are great for
bigger ones but this is great for you know this kind of thing where you want
to set up a more intricate space and you can see here I have the pillars shoved
into the pieces actually of the foam and look how nice that texture it picked up
the towel escape bus stamped texture just looks great and I hope you guys

things have a lot of possibilities for your games so go forth and craft enjoy
